com.krzysztof.pajak.note.detect

Class NoteEstimate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.krzysztof.pajak.note.detect.NoteEstimate

  • public class NoteEstimate
extends java.lang.Object
    NoteEstimate class uses (relatively) simple methods to detect the most probable note pitch played in sound sample represented in frequency domain input data.
    Author:
    Krzysztof Paj¹k

      • getNotes

        public static java.lang.String[] getNotes(double[] frequencies,
                                          double tolerance)
                                   throws InvalidNoteException
        Detecting pitch of the most probable notes played
        Parameters:
        frequencies - Data in frequency domain.
        tolerance - Tolerance factor in range [0.0,1.0] 1.0 the most strict, 0.0 the least.
        Returns:
        Array of notes
        Throws:
        InvalidNoteException

        Returns:
